ResourceHeader.ResourceName: THEMIS-D (P3) Electron and Ion Moments (GMOM) Ground-Calculated Particle Energy Fluxes and Moments: Density, Velocity, Pressure and Temperature

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, metadata versioned up to SPASE 2.6.0, reviewed by LFB 20230727

ResourceHeader.Description: THEMIS-D Electrostatic Analyzer (ESA) and Solid State Telescope (SST) Ground-Calculated Particle Energy Fluxes and Moments: Density, Velocity, Pressure, and Temperature. Generated from ESA and SST Combined Distributions. Data include Electron/Ion Ground-Calculated Fluxes and Spectrograms for Ions from 5 eV to 4 MeV and Electrons from 6 eV to 700 keV.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: V. Angelopoulos, C.W. Carlson, J. McFadden, NASA Contract NAS5-02099. Open Data for Scientific Use.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Angelopoulos, Vassilis; Carlson, Charles, W.; McFadden, James, P.

Parameter.Name: Ion Data Quality Flag, ESA-SST FF Mode
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTIFF_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ion Data Quality Flag, ESA-SST Full-Full Mode

Parameter.Name: Ion Density, ESA-SST FF Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTIFF_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ion Density, ESA-SST Full-Full Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_GMOM_QFLAG with the following input parameters: thd_ptiff_density, thd_ptiff_data_quality.

Parameter.Name: Ion Average Temperature, ESA-SST FF Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTIFF_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ion Average Temperature, ESA-SST Full-Full Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_GMOM_QFLAG with the following input parameters: thd_ptiff_avgtemp, thd_ptiff_data_quality.

Parameter.Name: Ion Thermal Velocity, ESA-SST FF Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTIFF_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ion Thermal Velocity, ESA-SST Full-Full Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_GMOM_QFLAG with the following input parameters: thd_ptiff_vthermal, thd_ptiff_data_quality.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Potential, ESA-SST FF Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTIFF_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Potential, Good Data only, this Variable uses the same Time Array as the Electron ESA-SST Full-Full Data Variables
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_GMOM_QFLAG with the following input parameters: thd_ptiff_sc_pot, thd_ptiff_data_quality.

Parameter.Name: Ion Energy Flux Spectrogram, ESA-SST FF Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTIFF_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ion Energy Flux Spectrogram Vector, ESA-SST Full-Full Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_GMOM_QFLAG with the following input parameters: thd_ptiff_en_eflux, thd_ptiff_data_quality.

Parameter.Name: Ion Diagonalized Temperature, ESA-SST FF Mode, Good Data only
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTIFF_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ion Diagonalized Temperature, ESA-SST Full-Full Mode (Tprp1, Tprp2, Tpar), Good Data only
Parameter.Caveats: Notes on diagonalized temperature: The first eigenvalue and eigenvector are the distinguishable eigenvalue and the major (symmetry) axis, respectively. The degenerate eigenvalues are sorted such that the 2nd eigenvalue is smaller than the third one. This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_GMOM_QFLAG with the following input parameters: thd_ptiff_t3, thd_ptiff_data_quality.

Parameter.Name: Ion Temperature, ESA-SST FF Mode, Field Aligned, Good Data only
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTIFF_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Ion Temperature, ESA-SST Full-Full Mode, Field Aligned (Tprp1FA, Tprp2FA, TparFA), Good Data only
Parameter.Caveats: 3d temperatures around magnetic axis (Z) and normal axes (X,Y), where Y is Z direction crosed into Sun direction, and X completes orthogonal system. This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function APPLY_GMOM_QFLAG with the following input parameters: thd_ptiff_magt3, thd_ptiff_data_quality.

Parameter.Name: Electron Diagonalized Temperature, ESA-SST BB Mode, all Data Qualities
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTEBB_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electron Diagonalized Temperature, ESA-SST Burst-Burst Mode (Tprp1, Tprp2, Tpar), all Data Qualities
Parameter.Caveats: Notes on diagonalized temperature: The first eigenvalue and eigenvector are the distinguishable eigenvalue and the major (symmetry) axis, respectively. The degenerate eigenvalues are sorted such that the 2nd eigenvalue is smaller than the third one.

Parameter.Name: Electron Temperature, ESA-SST BB Mode, Field Aligned, all Data Qualities
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: THD_PTEBB_EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Electron Temperature, ESA-SST Burst-Burst Mode, Field Aligned (Tprp1FA, Tprp2FA, TparFA), all Data Qualities
Parameter.Caveats: 3d temperatures around magnetic axis (Z) and normal axes (X,Y), where Y is Z direction crosed into Sun direction, and X completes orthogonal system.
